categories: Category:Articles in need of major additions

nodes.text: After the break out aboard the Chimaera, the Galactic Empire found the Grysk Hegemony colonizing the moons surrounding the planet of Mokivj. The battle would lead to the rescue of Force-sensitive Chiss girls who were held in hibernation chambers down and the old Separatist droid factory.

Darth Vader took his personal legion, the First Legion, down to the planet's surface to take out the Grysk holding the Chiss children hostage within the factory. Meanwhile, Grand Admiral Thrawn dealt with the starships above.
